mainboard.name: Beacon of Unrest
mainboard.oracle_text: Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.

mainboard.name: Reiver Demon
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
When Reiver Demon enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, destroy all nonartifact, nonblack creatures. They can't be regenerated.

mainboard.name: Quest for the Gravelord
mainboard.oracle_text:
Whenever a creature dies, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Gravelord.
Remove three quest counters from Quest for the Gravelord and sacrifice it: Create a 5/5 black Zombie Giant creature token.

mainboard.name: Liliana, Death's Majesty
mainboard.oracle_text:
+1: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Mill two cards.
−3: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.
−7: Destroy all non-Zombie creatures.

mainboard.name: Stitcher's Supplier
mainboard.oracle_text: When Stitcher's Supplier enters the battlefield or dies, mill three cards.

mainboard.name: Kalastria Highborn
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever Kalastria Highborn or another Vampire you control dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

mainboard.name: Bloodghast
mainboard.oracle_text:
Bloodghast can't block.
Bloodghast has haste as long as an opponent has 10 or less life.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Bloodghast from your graveyard to the battlefield.

mainboard.name: Gravedigger
mainboard.oracle_text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

mainboard.name: Vampire Hexmage
mainboard.oracle_text:
First strike
Sacrifice Vampire Hexmage: Remove all counters from target permanent.

mainboard.name: Mindslaver
mainboard.oracle_text: {4}, {T}, Sacrifice Mindslaver: You control target player during that player's next turn. (You see all cards that player could see and make all decisions for the player.)

mainboard.name: Diabolic Tutor
mainboard.oracle_text: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

mainboard.name: Dread Statuary
mainboard.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{4}: Dread Statuary becomes a 4/2 Golem artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

mainboard.name: Zulaport Cutthroat
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever Zulaport Cutthroat or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

mainboard.name: Disfigure
mainboard.oracle_text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

mainboard.name: Rise from the Grave
mainboard.oracle_text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

mainboard.name: Whisper, Blood Liturgist
mainboard.oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice two creatures: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

mainboard.name: Quietus Spike
Will-o'-the-Wisp
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{B}: Regenerate Will-o'-the-Wisp. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

mainboard.name: Archfiend of Ifnir
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cycle or discard another card, put a -1/-1 counter on each creature your opponents control.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

mainboard.name: Unmake
mainboard.oracle_text: Exile target creature.

mainboard.name: Throne of the God-Pharaoh
mainboard.oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, each opponent loses life equal to the number of tapped creatures you control.

mainboard.name: The Long Reach of Night // Animus of Night's Reach
Pharika's Spawn
mainboard.oracle_text:
Escape—{5}{B}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
Pharika's Spawn escapes with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it enters the battlefield this way, each opponent sacrifices a non-Gorgon creature.

mainboard.name: Sanctum Seeker
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever a Vampire you control attacks, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

mainboard.name: Severed Strands
mainboard.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness. Destroy target creature an opponent controls.
